name: Delivery Kore
description:
◻ Welcome to Eleusis, the forest of Middle-earth where souls of the dead gather!◻ The Forest Girl and the Forest Child The souls of the dead are reborn in various forms such as plants and animals in Eleusis. 「Kore」, the girl of the forest, takes the cute 「Poring」, the child of the forest, and combines souls to create a new life.◻ Open World Adventure: Your own sensibility & healing story created in the forest Gather souls with Poring and discover new places and animals in a colorful and changing forest landscape. And create Light Poring against the threat of 「Black Storm」 that has invaded Eleusis and save the forest.

Freely roam the forest with Kore and Poring and write down your own play. Are you ready to embark on a life of open world adventure that can be a little fast or a little slow?◻ Poring, the Container of Souls Poring has the ability to contain souls. While exploring Eleusis, the combination of souls you put in your Poring will have a great impact on the girl who will be born in the future. Don't you wonder what kind of girl your Poring will evolve into as it grows?◻ The Black Storm The "Black Storm" that started long ago. Alongside the Black Storm, menacing and powerful lightning threatens the fragile Porings. Please protect the Porings from the threat of the Black Storm!◻ DIY Kore: Customize Your Own Kore to Your Taste! Choose costumes and hairstyles to create your own Kore that perfectly reflects your preferences. It will make your adventure even more enjoyable. Just be careful not to change too much, or Poring might not recognize you!◻ Game Features • Single-player experience

• Freedom of an open world
• Farming is enjoyable!
• Adorable creatures
• Serene atmosphere of the forest
